Talks

Conference Abstracts

  • A fast-integration-based model for polydisperse bubble cloud dynamics and their two-way-flow coupling
    S. H. Bryngelson and T. Colonius, Journal of the Acoustical Society of America (2020)

  • Annular and spiral bubble nets: A simulation-focused analysis of humpback whale feeding strategies
    S. H. Bryngelson and T. Colonius, Journal of the Acoustical Society of America, 146(4) 2771 (2019)

  • Neural-network-augmented Gaussian moment method for the statistics of cavitating bubble populations
    S. H. Bryngelson, A. Charalampopoulos, T. P. Sapsis, T. Colonius, Americal Physical Society (2019)

  • Simulations of a collapsing gas bubble above a crevice
    T. Trummler, K. Schmidmayer, S. H. Bryngelson, T. Colonius, SoCal Fluids XIII (2019)

  • Simulations and acoustics of humpback whale bubble-net feeding
    S. H. Bryngelson and T. Colonius, SoCal Fluids XIII (2019)

  • Modeling approaches for bubbly, cavitating flows
    S. H. Bryngelson and T. Colonius, Americal Physical Society (2018)

  • Floquet stability of tank-treading and tumbling capsules in viscous shear flow
    S. H. Bryngelson and J. B. Freund, Americal Physical Society (2017)

  • Stability of flowing red blood cell trains
    S. H. Bryngelson and J. B. Freund, Blood Flow (Paris, France) (2017)

  • Global stability of fully coupled capsule flow systems
    S. H. Bryngelson and J. B. Freund, SIAM Computational Science and Engineering (2017)

  • Stability and transition to chaos of regular capsule trains
    S. H. Bryngelson and J. B. Freund, Americal Physical Society (2016)

  • Buckling and its effect on the confined flow of a capsule suspension
    S. H. Bryngelson and J. B. Freund, Americal Physical Society (2015)
